"A.P.242/3/10/10:15": "...<%me>. Where are we...?"
"This is the Kakuriyo. A land situated in the divide between our world and the next."
"Sukuna-hime! You're alright...!"
"But, the other Shironians were..."
"Ever the quick one to jump to conclusions, you are. Matoi, look around."
"...Huh? Kotoshiro?"
"Yes, it has been a while. There are others too, gathered beyond here."
"You may think of this as our emergency sanctuary. While it is a sacred place, our intrusion is a necessity."
"Lady Sukuna-hime was quick to sense the arrival of the tyrannical one, and relocated everyone here to the Kakuriyo."
"Not everyone was saved. Even I am not that all-powerful. The sacrifices were...many."
"Still, 'tis far better than the fate the Kuronians met. Ahah."
"If we had only come sooner..."
"The blame is not yours. Had you arrived earlier, the outcome would remain largely unchanged."
"That rogue bears incredible power. You would...no, I fear even I would pale in comparison."
"Now speak, you two. Tell me all you know of this being."
"I see. It was those who bore the ARKS. They gave rise to something extraordinary."
"That's what Xiao told us. Shiva's power comes from their near-infinite Photon abilities."
"We thought if you... If you used the Braided Ash Formation to seal her...we might stand a chance."
"An idea befitting that child. You hatched a similar scheme to bind Matoi's powers when she went berserk."
"My power, and the Photons you use. They bear some similarity, so you were able to make use of it."
"...Very well, you two. Would you accept a request of mine?"
"Anything."
"What do you need?"
"Sure. We'll help however we can!"
"...Ahah, what sincerity."
"Kotoshiro."
"Yes."
"For you I have a separate task."
